page.title: 19Uppermill 6
page.content: Most families have at{least one car, but there is still a heavy reliance on {public transport}as it is necessary to travel from the area for many services, hospitals, large shops and work. The area is served by many{bus {routes}from Manchester, Oldham, Ashton and Huddersfield, although they are not very frequent tot outlying areas. There is a lot of concern at present that these services may be further {reduced}as a result of legislation. The Manchester to Leeds{railway}line runs through Uppermill,which does not have a station. Some trains do however stop at the neighbouring village of Greenfield. {Traffic problems}are not a feature of the area, except at weekends in the summer when the influx of visitors causes some congestion.
